scripts.pre-publish: npm run lint && npm run update-submodules && npm run version-patch
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @monster-js/cli && npm run lint -w @monster-js/core && npm run lint -w @monster-js/router && npm run lint -w @monster-js/store && npm run lint -w @monster-js/tester
scripts.publish: npm run lint && npm run publish-cli && npm run publish-core && npm run publish-router && npm run publish-store && npm run publish-tester && npm run publish-transformer
scripts.version-patch: npm version patch && npm version patch -w @monster-js/cli && npm version patch -w @monster-js/core && npm version patch -w @monster-js/router && npm version patch -w @monster-js/store && npm version patch -w @monster-js/tester && npm version patch -w @monster-js/transformer
